name: The Few Who Stand 2
description:
The initial invasion was simply a small scouting fleet and the main hive has arrived.  Do not let the Partacan worms break through the defensive line.  Do not let them take Freed. Billions will die without you.

Sentinel, the Federation is counting on you.

Music from 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ 

https://www.bensound.com

https://www.purple-planet.com

Some sounds from

https://freesound.org/

Feel free to report bugs and give feedback in the comments
